name: FanFiction.Net – re-enable selection of text
description: Allows you to select text when reading stories on FanFiction.Net. (FF.Net blocks selection of story text; this style undoes the block.) Balm for compulsive highlighters, as well as users who want to select text to do something with it.
additional_info: After writing this style, I found out there were already a few similar styles on the site. But I’m posting my user style anyway because my style’s source code also includes information on the source of the problem, and I like the name, description, and screenshot of mine a bit more than the others’. Also, the differently-worded title increases the chance that someone looking for a style like this will be able to find what they need.
